DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate therapeutic effect functional goat cheese obese overweight people alter lipid profile . The functional goat cheese contain polyunsaturated fatty acid , amount exceed cheese , develop benefit cardiovascular health people need normalize lipid profile ; long term contribute prevention cardiovascular disease .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Goat Cheese Effect Lipid Profile Change
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , parallel , double-blind , control perform evaluate effect functional goat cheese lipid profile overweight obese volunteer need special diet . Were include 60 volunteer ( men woman ) age 18 65 year ( IMC ≥27 < 40 Kg/m2 ) cardiovascular risk ( < 10 % ) . The volunteer follow La Paz University Hospital Madrid . For 12 week , volunteer consume 60 g cheese daily ( functional cheese control cheese ) receive advice follow balance individualized hypocaloric diet well physical activity .
DOC.criteria: Volunteers overweight type II obesity type I II ( IMC ≥27 < 40 Kg/m2 ) . Cardiovascular risk < 10 % almost two follow factor : Men ≥ 45 year old woman ≥ 55 year old ; Familiar background premature cardiovascular disease ; HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dL men < 50 mg/dL woman ; Total cholesterol ≥ 200 mg/dL ; Triglycerides ≥ 150 mg/dL < 200 mg/dL ; LDL ≥ 130 mg/dL < 160 mg/dL ; Smoker Accept advise perform balance hypocaloric diet regular practice physical activity . Signed informed consent . Individuals Diabetes Mellitus type 1 ; Individuals Diabetes Mellitus type 2 , use medication ; Individuals Dyslipidemia , use drug ; Individuals high blood pressure , use medication ; Individuals allergies dairy protein ; Individuals severe disease ( hepatic , kidney , cancer… ) ; Individuals drug supplement consumption weight lose ; Individuals consume drug , ω3 supplement supplement modify lipid / glucose profile ( statin , fibrates , diuretic , corticosteroid , insulin… ) ; Individuals participate program / clinical trial weight control last 6 month ; Individuals increase alcohol consumption 30g/day ; Individuals stop smoke next 20 week ( study ) ; Individuals mental disease low cognitive function ; Pregnant woman breastfeed ; Individuals intensive physical activity ; Individuals physical problem comply recommendation physical activity diet general recommendation .
